TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1260
TEI.2.document_title: Littleberry Hawkins to Stephen F. Austin, 01-25-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1260

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Introducing Dr. Jacob Fry.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-25-1826">25 January 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir*/p* *p*Permit me to introduce to you my friend *person_mentioned*Doct Jacob Fry*/person_mentioned* who is a *person_mentioned*physician */person_mentioned*of good standing any attentions shown him or services rendered during his stay in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* will be thankfully recollected You will find him a correct man and one that will make an important addition to the *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*L Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
